articles.title: SpiceJet aircraft caught in Kalbaishakhi while landing, 40 injured as bags rain on flyers - India Today
articles.description: At least 40 passengers were injured after cabin luggage fell on flyers as a SpiceJet plane got caught up in a storm. Most of the passengers sustained head injuries.

articles.title: New Pak PM secures $8 billion Saudi bailout for cash-strapped country: Report - India Today
articles.description: Saudi Arabia has agreed to provide Pakistan with a "sizeable package" of around USD 8 billion to help the country bolster dwindling forex reserves and revive its ailing economy, reports said on Sunday.
